page.title: 08STREETS AND BUILDINGS vi.
page.content:
High St.i.
High St runs North-East from the Square until it merges with Wellingborough Rd, and the 19th Century terrace development around North Rd,and King St. Opposite the Coop.Department Store is the Old Vicarage. A 19th century edifice recently converted to use as an Old Peoples Residence.As with many sites in the village, it trades on the historical past.(Tower D-I-Y Shop,Saxon Lodge int.al.)A new Vicarage has been erected between Saxon Lodge and a farm. Shops in High St. include a Newsagent, Hairdresser,Shoe shop and Furniture/ Removals. Other commercial premises are offices,Builders,and engineering works. Of the buildings,all are brick except the furniture shop which was previously The Fox & Hounds Public House.
